page.title: 04The Lambton Worm.
page.content: {The adventures of Lord John Lambton {are told in a well known legend:- One Sunday John went fishing while everyone else went to church.He fished for hours but caught nothing except a worm which he threw down the local well.He then went off to the Crusades. While he was away the worm grew enormous and began eating cows,sheep and children.When John came back he consulted the local witch.She said, "You will have to wear a suit of armour with spikes so that when the worm wraps itself around you it will split into pieces which will float away in the river.In return for my advice,once the worm is dead,you must kill the first living thing that you see."The first thing that John saw was his father and as he couldn't kill him the witch cursed the next nine generations of his family.
